bridge-type.label: Calendar
bridge-type.description: Calendar based on an iCal calendar.

parameter.name: refreshTime
parameter.label: Refresh Time
parameter.description: Frequency to scan for changes in minutes

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: User name for fetching the calendar (usable in combination with password in HTTP basic auth)

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password for fetching the calendar (usable in combination with user name in HTTP basic auth)

parameter.name: maxSize
parameter.label: Maximum Calendar Size
parameter.description: The maximum size of the calendar in Megabytes

parameter.name: authorizationCode
parameter.label: Command Authorization Code
parameter.description: Authorization Code to allow the execution of Command Tags (may be empty)

parameter.name: userAgent
parameter.label: User Agent
parameter.description: Some providers require a specific user agent header. If left empty, the default Jetty header is used.

channel-type.label: Current Event Title
channel-type.description: Title of the currently present event

channel-type.label: Current Event Start
channel-type.description: Start of the currently present event

channel-type.label: Current Event End
channel-type.description: End of the currently present event

channel-type.label: Next Event Title
channel-type.description: Title of the next starting event in calendar

channel-type.label: Next Event Start
channel-type.description: Start of the next event in calendar

channel-type.label: Next Event End
channel-type.description: End of the next event in calendar

channel-type.label: Start of Result
channel-type.description: Start of the found result in calendar

channel-type.label: End of Result
channel-type.description: End of the found result in calendar

channel-type.label: Title of Result
channel-type.description: Title of the found result in calendar

channel-type.label: Last Update
channel-type.description: The time the calendar was updated successfully last time

channel-group-type.label: Result Event
channel-group-type.description: A resulting event found by filter

parameter.name: maxEvents
parameter.label: Maximum Matches
parameter.description: Maximum matches found by this filter

parameter.name: refreshTime
parameter.label: Refresh Time
parameter.description: The frequency in minutes the channels get refreshed

parameter.name: datetimeUnit
parameter.label: Date/Time Unit
parameter.description: Date or time unit for start and end

parameter.name: datetimeStart
parameter.label: Start
parameter.description: Start date/time amount to find events relative to "now" (inclusive)

parameter.name: datetimeEnd
parameter.label: End
parameter.description: End date/time amount to find events relative to "now" (exclusive)

parameter.name: datetimeRound
parameter.label: Round to Date/Time unit
parameter.description: Setting this will round start and end date/time to the unit down (e.g. if unit is day: start and end will be rounded to 0:00 day time)

parameter.name: textValueType
parameter.label: Value Type
parameter.description: "text" checks the value for containment, "regular expression" matches whole value
